subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: It took time for the Royals to get over losing Game 7 of the 2014 World Series to the Giants, but, entering their series with the Yankees, they seemed poised to try again.
snippet: It took time for the Royals to get over losing Game 7 of the 2014 World Series to the Giants, but, entering their series with the Yankees, they seemed poised to try again.
